caption: Boba tea was not good. Immediately threw out

Y'all the green apple tea with mango boba is probably the best drink I've ever had probably ever. There's so many options sugar free, dairy, non-dairy, etc. especially when it comes to the flavors. Can't wait to go back!

There are many different ways to customize your bowl and it is extremely reasonable.  It only took a few minutes for my custom bowl to be made,  and the chef was very personable and friendly and answered my questions with a smile. A large bowl could very easily be 2 meals. My only complaint is I was there on vacation and can't order it again!
I was surprised with how many options this small place had. It was so delicious and I’m glad I didn’t walk half an hour to another poke place with more reviews.
